source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_00<tab>Momodi wishes to enlist the aid of a trusted friend of Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_00<tab>クイックサンドのモモディは、冒険者の腕を見込んで頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_01<tab>Having sworn you to secrecy, Momodi reveals that the royal crown has been stolen. According to her, if the theft were to be made public, it would tarnish the sultana's reputation. She suspects that the missive which Fufulupa found amongst Baldewyn's possessions was written by the perpetrators of this crime. Momodi bids you bear the letter to its intended recipient, Owyne of the Sultansworn, and offer your assistance.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_01<tab>モモディが言うには、最近、王宮から王冠が盗まれる事件が起こったらしい。封書の宛先にあるオワインとは、事件の原因だと噂されている人物だそうだ。モモディは信頼する冒険者に、手紙を銀冑団まで届けてほしいようだ。銀冑団総長室にいる「オワイン」に「オワイン宛の封書」を届けに行こう。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_02<tab>Owyne confirms that the letter is a ransom note from the thieves, stating their demands for the return of the crown. Believing there to be no other way, the guilt-ridden Sultansworn decides to give the criminals what they want. Rendezvous with him at the Unholy Heir in central Thanalan and ensure the exchange goes as planned.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_02<tab>封書には王冠を奪った賊からの伝言が記されていたようだ。賊との取り引きを成功させるためには、オワインを護衛する必要がある。「アンホーリーエアー」に向かい、オワインを待とう。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_03<tab>Having taken receipt of their payment, the thieves rather predictably attempt to murder you, but with the aid of Papashan and a band of Sultansworn, you defeat them.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_03<tab>無事に賊を討伐することができた。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_04<tab>After the Sultansworn leave, you find yourself alone with the masked mage who orchestrated the theft, and another battle ensues. Fortunately, Thancred comes to your aid, and together you emerge triumphant. Though the motives of this “Ascian” remain a mystery, his schemes now lie in ruin. Return to the Heart of the Sworn and find out if the Sultansworn have recovered the crown.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_04<tab>「天使い」だという魔道士の近くに落ちていた水晶、異邦シャーレアンの民だというサンクレッド……。不思議に思う点は多いが、ともあれ事件は解決を見たようだ。銀冑団総長室の「パパシャン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_05<tab>The sultana visits the Heart of the Sworn to thank you personally for helping to recover the crown, and to request your presence at the forthcoming banquet as her guest of honor. Though her gesture leaves you speechless, you gather your composure and accept, already looking forward to your next meeting.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_05<tab>ウルダハのために活躍した冒険者へ、女王ナナモは深く感謝しているようだ。その印として、ある品の進呈と晩餐会への招待をしてくれた。女王ナナモに仕えるラウバーンも、活躍目覚ましい冒険者が晩餐会へ出席することを望んでいるようだ。これからも、ウルダハの力になれるよう努めていこう。

target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SEQ_06<tab>

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the letter to Owyne.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_00<tab>銀冑団総長室のオワインにオワイン宛の封書を渡す

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_01<tab>Rendezvous with Owyne at the Unholy Heir.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_01<tab>アンホーリーエアーでオワインを待つ

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Papashan in the Heart of the Sworn.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_02<tab>銀冑団総長室のパパシャンに報告

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Papashan in the Heart of the Sworn.

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_050_1<tab>Can I count on your discretion, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? If so, then listen closely...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_050_1よかったわ、引き受けてくれるのね。
実はね……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_1<tab>The outside world believes Ul'dah to be a sultanate, ruled by Sultana Nanamo Ul Namo. Truth is, though, it's the six wealthiest citizens that hold the most sway─the Syndicate.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_1このウルダハは、対外的には王政をとって、
ナナモ女王陛下を元首と仰いでいるわ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_2<tab>Be that as it may, the sultana's still got the support of the people...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_2でも実際は、「砂蠍衆」と呼ばれる
6人の有力者による合議制によって動いている……。
彼らは圧倒的な富で、政治の実権を握っているの。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_3<tab>But she might struggle to keep even that if a certain incident becomes public knowledge.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_3……そんなウルダハで、最近ある事件が起きたの。
公にはなっていないのだけど、
王宮から、王家の象徴である王冠が盗まれたらしいのよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_4<tab>It pains me to say it, but Her Grace's crown, the symbol of the royal dynasty, has been stolen.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_4傀儡の女王だと言われて、ただでさえ肩身の狭い王家が、
この事件のために、さらに面目を失ったって聞いたわ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_5<tab>And Owyne...Owyne's the Sultansworn who was charged with guardin' it that night.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_5手紙の宛先のオワインさん……。
この事件で、王冠が盗まれる原因になったって
噂の人なのよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_6<tab>I'd bet anythin' this letter was written by the bastards who made off with the crown.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_6わたしの勘だけど……。
この手紙を書いたのって、事件の犯人かもしれないわ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_7<tab>It can't be a coincidence that a man we know to have been fraternizin' with thieves had a letter for Owyne of all people, at this of all times.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_7事件の噂が立った後に、その人に宛て、
銀冑団にまで届けに行かせる……。
わざと目立つようにしてるのが、どうも引っかかるの。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_8<tab>You need to take this to the man himself, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Tell him Momodi sent you, and that it concerns a lost heirloom.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_8この手紙、あなたが渡しに行ったほうがいいわ。
……きっと冒険者の力が必要になる。
わたしの名前を出せば、案内してもらえるはずよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_9<tab>If it looks as though the fellow needs help, I want you to lend it to him. The future of our fair city may depend on it.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MOMODI_000_9もしかしたら、ウルダハの未来に関わることになる。
このクイックサンドの未来もね。
……頼んだわよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_10<tab>The Heart of the Sworn lies beyond. State your business.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_10ここより先は銀冑団総長室。
無用の者は入ることまかりならん。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_11<tab>...Pardon? Did you say a <var 1A 02 /var>lost heirloom<var 1A 01 /var>? Ahem. Proceed.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_11何？　クイックサンドのモモディ女史からの使いとな？
……わかった。事情があるなら話は別だ。
中に案内しよう。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_Q1_000_1<tab>Proceed into the Heart of the Sworn?
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_Q1_000_1<tab>銀冑団総長室に入る？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_A1_000_1<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_A1_000_1<tab>はい

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_A1_000_2<tab>No
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_A1_000_2<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_12<tab>What are you playing at, adventurer? Did Momodi truly send you? If this is some sort of prank, there <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be consequences!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_12まさか、モモディ女史からの使いとは出まかせか！？
栄えある銀冑団を虚仮にしようというのであれば、
ただではおかんぞ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_20<tab>Well met, adventurer. What business brings you here this day?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_20いかにも、私がオワインだ。
冒険者が銀冑団に用があるのか？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_21<tab>...A letter? Very well, let's see it.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_21私に手紙だと？
なぜ冒険者が届けに来るのだ。
……ともかく、受け取ろう。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_22<tab>...Have you read this, adventurer?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_22こ、これは……。
……冒険者よ。
お前は、この中身を読んだか？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_23<tab>I see. But you have some inkling as to its contents, I think.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_23そうか、ならいい……。
お前が心ある冒険者でよかったよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_24<tab>Mistress Momodi has doubtless explained to you the significance of the crown, and what its loss could mean for Her Grace the sultana... <sigh> This theft shames the Sultansworn─and me most of all.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_24冒険者よ。
モモディ女史が見込んだお前を信じて、
ひとつ仕事を頼みたい。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_25<tab>The blame is mine, you see. I grew lax in my duties, and in a moment of carelessness...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_25私は近々、ある取り引きに出向かなければならない。
その時の護衛を依頼したいのだ……。

source:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_26No, it will do no good to recount the tale now.
Since the hour of the theft, we've searched frantically for any signs, any whispers as to the whereabouts of the crown. We have found nothing.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_26……いや、隠しごとはよそう。
すでに噂も立っている。
冒険者なら耳にしているだろうからな。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_27<tab>The identity of the thieves, and their motives, seemed fated to remain a mystery─until you arrived, bearing this ransom note.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_27ウルダハ王家の王冠が、
式典中に盗まれたという話を知っているか？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_28<tab>In it, the criminals state their price for the return of Her Grace's crown.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_28その時、王冠を警護していたのは私なのだ……。
日々の平穏に慣れ、油断していた自分が恥ずかしい。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_29<tab>And though it pains me to say it, I fear I have no choice but to acquiesce to their demands. Too much is at stake to do otherwise. The crown symbolizes Her Grace's birthright, and identifies her as the custodian of the Ul legacy. It <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be recovered.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_29お前が届けてくれた手紙……。
これは、その王冠を奪った賊からの取り引きの伝言だ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_30<tab>I will travel to the Unholy Heir and pay them their ransom.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_30「アンホーリーエアー」に行き、あるものを引き渡せば、
王冠を返すと言ってきている。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_31<tab>Though I am not foolish enough to meet these men alone as they stipulate, I dare not bring a host of my comrades lest the thieves take fright. Friend─would <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> consent to be present for the exchange?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_31……私は、この命に代えても、
その取引を成立させなければならない。
ナナモ女王陛下のために……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_32<tab>Mistress Momodi has always spoken of you in the most glowing terms, and I have never yet had reason to question her judgment.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_32しかし相手は、ウルダハでも有名な犯罪者集団。
それに、自分は実戦はからっきしだ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_33<tab>On behalf of all those still loyal to the sultana, I beseech you─help us in our hour of need.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_33冒険者よ。
「アンホーリーエアー」への護衛を頼む！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_40<tab>Pray meet me at the Unholy Heir in central Thanalan, east of Black Brush Station. If the gods are good, the exchange will proceed without incident...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_40冒険者よ、護衛の任務、よろしく頼んだぞ。
取り引き場所は「アンホーリーエアー」、
ブラックブラッシュ停留所を東に行った先だ。

source:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_TITLEDuty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“MANWIL007”?
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_TITLE<tab>クエスト「至宝の影で蠢く闇」のバトルを開始しますか？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_YES<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_YES<tab>はい

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_NO<tab>No
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_INSTANCE_BATTLE_YESNO_NO<tab>いいえ

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_50<tab>I've come as agreed! Now, show me the crown!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_50約束のものは持ってきた。
さあ、王冠を返してもらおう！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_51<tab>Aye, you'll have your precious crown─once we've been duly compensated.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_51王冠はこちらに……。
ただ、渡すのはそちらが先ですよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_52<tab>Do you think me a fool!? What assurance have I that you will honor your part of the agreement?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_52卑怯なっ！
その後に、貴様らが王冠を返す保証が
ないではないか！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_53<tab>Now, now, Owyne...you're the least trustworthy man here. Not only was the crown stolen on <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> watch, but it looks to me as if you've violated the terms of our exchange. Did we not say that you were to come alone?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_53おやおや……。
卑怯はあなたでしょう、不名誉なオワイン殿。
他言無用と手紙に記したのに、冒険者など引き連れて……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_54<tab>And given that you are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> alone, what guarantee have we that there isn't a company of archers surrounding us even as we speak, ready to feather me and my men the moment they catch a glimpse of the crown?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_54我々こそ不安ですよ。
王冠を渡したとたん、四方から矢の嵐。
……なんてことが、あるかもしれないのですから。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_55<tab>You have made mock of our trust. The deal is off.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_55この取り引きは無効ですね……。
ふいにしたのは……あなただ、オワイン殿。
後悔なさるといい。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_56<tab>Wait! Here's your payment, as promised!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_56ま、待て！
約束の霊薬はこれだ、持って行け！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_57<tab><sniff> <sniff> ...Aye, 'tis the real thing.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_57聞いていたとおり、水仙の香りが漂っています。
どうやら、本物のようですね……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_58<tab>Ahahaha! A thousand thanks to you, boy! You've succeeded where scores of thieves have failed!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_58ヒヒヒヒッ、ついに手に入れたぞ……。
人をゾンビーと化し、真に不滅の兵と成す、
ウルダハの禁忌……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_59<tab>And now, at long last, we have it! The power to create an army of undying soldiers─<var 1A 02 /var>The Traders' Spurn<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_59近衛騎士でなければ、とても入ることができない、
王宮の宝物庫の奥に秘蔵されていた、
幻の霊薬「ゾンビパウダー」！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_60<tab>No...no, it can't be! What have I done!?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_60なにっ！？
若返りの薬では……ないだと……！？
だましたのか、貴様っ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_61<tab>Surely you must have wondered what it was that you were handing over─what it was that seemed as valuable to us as the crown seemed to you? Or did you assume we were feeling <var 1A 02 /var>charitable<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_61何も知らずに、ウルダハを滅ぼしかねない薬を
持ち出してくるとは！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_62<tab>Ah, but you must feel terrible, knowing that you've brought us the doom of Sil'dih. Worry not, boy─we'll grant you a quick death and spare you further ignominy.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_62貴様は、本当に不名誉な男だな！
不名誉過ぎて、生きているのも辛かろう！？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_63<tab>There's too many, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Run! Run while you still can! I...I will do my duty.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_63……すまない冒険者、お前を巻き込んでしまった。
かくなる上は、我が命を捨ててでも……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_64<tab>(-???-)It's your duty to serve the sultana, lad─and you'll be doing it for a good while yet!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_64(-？？？？-)軽々に命を捨ててはならぬ！
お主の命は、ナナモ様のものじゃ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_65<tab>Sultansworn! Put these thieves to the sword and secure the crown!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_65話はあとだ、)) (( )) 03 /var>殿。
……ゆくぞ、オワイン！
ウルダハ王家の名の下に、不埒な賊を成敗してくれようぞ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_66<tab>Sultansworn!? Hah! No matter! Kill them all!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_GARIBALD_000_66王家だと……？
おかざりが何をぬかすか！
ええい、そこの冒険者もまとめて皆殺しだ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_70<tab>Master Papashan! But why...? How...?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_70はあっ…はあっ……。
パパシャン殿が……なぜ、ここに……？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_71<tab>The General saw you sneak into the vaults, Owyne.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_71宝物庫で、お主が何やらやっているのを
局長が見かけてな……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_72<tab>He suspected something was afoot and ordered us to keep an eye on you.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_72王冠のことで、お主に危害が及ばぬよう、
付いて行ってやれと頼まれたのだ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_73<tab>The Flame General...? He ordered you to look after me?
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_73<tab>ラウバーン局長が……？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORM_000_74<tab>Master Papashan! More of them to the north!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORM_000_74<tab>こっちにも、賊の一団がいたぞ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_75<tab>After them, Sultansworn─they have the crown! This lot sought only to delay us!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_75逃がすな、追え！
こちらは罠じゃ、おそらく王冠はその一団が持っておる！
……オワイン、我々も行くぞ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_76<tab>Let us speak again back in the city!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_76)) (( )) 03 /var>殿、感謝する。
私たちは王冠を奪還してくる！
後ほど、ウルダハでお会いしよう！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_77<tab>The source of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> strength becomes clear...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_77なるほど、それが力の理由か……。
どうりで石人形ごときではかなわぬはずだ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_78<tab>You may have bested the golem, but you will not fare so well this day.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_78しかし……！
これはどうかな？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_79<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>O mournful voice of creation! Send unto me a creature of the abyss, my thrall to command, that I may smite mine enemies!<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_79示せ、創世の理の嘆き声よ。
空虚に有りし夾雑の御霊を呼び出さん……。
出よ、深淵の悍魂よ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_80<tab>Your very being imperils the plan. You cannot be suffered to live.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_80貴様は危険な存在だ。
ここで芽を摘んでおくとしよう。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_90<tab>Unnngh... That the wisdom of the Paragons should be brought low...by mere mortals...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_MASKEDMAGUS_000_90我ら「天使い」の……秘術が……。
……打ち破られるとは……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_91<tab>Paragons? This is indeed a disturbing revelation...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_91天使い（あまつかい）だと？
……そうだったのか。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_92<tab>We had long suspected the involvement of the Bringers of Chaos─<var 1A 02 /var>Ascians<var 1A 01 /var>, to give them their true name.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_92混乱の創造主「天使い」。
いや、伝承に沿って「アシエン」と呼ぶべきか……。
実在していたとは。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_93<tab>But we could not be sure they were responsible for the recent disturbances until now. As if the sultanate needed any more enemies...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_93蛮族の陰にアシエン有り、という情報は、
本当だったんだな。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_94<tab>Hm? Have we Sharlayans crossed paths with Ascians before? Well, we've certainly─ Wait. I don't recall telling you about my homeland.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_94それが、シャーレアンから来た目的か……だって？
なぜ、俺が異邦の……。
シャーレアンの民だと解ったんだ？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_95<tab>Ah, yes, that's right─you're one of the gifted.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_95……いや、言わなくていい。
君は「あの力」を持っているようだ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_96<tab>You know, this marks the third time I've found you in the midst of trouble. If I didn't know any better, I'd say you're a lodestone for it!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_96嫌な気配を感じて来てみれば、
こんなことになっていたなんてな。
……でも、お陰で収穫があったよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_97<tab>Anyway, I'm glad I started following you around. Who knows what grand conspiracy you'll stumble upon next!?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_97しかし、お見事だったな！
あんな化け物を撃退するとは。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_98<tab>I jest, I jest... Had I truly been watching your every move, I wouldn't have taken so long to intervene in your latest altercation.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_98……と、そんな顔をしないでくれ。
君を試そうとしたわけじゃないさ。
アシエンの登場は「俺たち」にも予想外だったんだ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_99<tab>But all's well that ends well, eh? Our masked friend is no more, and while I very much doubt we've seen the last of his kind, his demise will likely grant us at least <var 1A 02 /var>some<var 1A 01 /var> respite. And on that note, I must away. Until next time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_THANCRED_000_99なんにせよ、これで王宮の方は落ち着くだろう。
君も、銀冑団へ報告に帰るといい。
……また会おう！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_110<tab>Everyone is waiting for you, adventurer.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_110オワインさんから話は聞いている。
さぁ、早く中へ入りたまえ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_111<tab>Pray do not keep my comrades waiting.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_SULTANSWORMA_000_111用向きがあれば、
遠慮なく自分に声をかけたまえ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_200<tab>Does it surprise you to see me dressed so, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? I was once a Sultansworn, you know, though it's been fifteen years since I put down my sword, and took up the role of stationmaster.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_200実は、私は元銀冑団でしてな。
今は退役し、ウルダハ操車庫の所長をやっておりますわい。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_201<tab>It is a capacity in which I am no less proud to serve, lest you doubt. Whenever Her Grace ventures outside the gates, I have the honor of protecting her person.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_201ナナモ女王陛下が、お忍びで外出されるときには、
よく私を訪ねてくださってな。
お目付け役をやらせていただいておるのですよ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_202<tab>Never before had I seen her so despondent as when news of the crown's theft reached her ears.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_202あれから、無事に王冠を奪還し、王家に返還いたした。
ナナモ女王陛下も、それはそれはお喜びじゃったよ。
……すべては、お主のおかげじゃ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_203<tab>But thanks to your valiant efforts, she is returned to her former vibrant self. You have the gratitude of every Sultansworn, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_PAPASHAN_000_203先だっては、その我が主を救っていただき、
そしてまた、若き騎士の手助けをしていただいた。
心より、お礼申し上げる。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400010_LADYSMAID<tab>Exalted vessel of Nald'thal, guardian of Thanalan, seventeenth ascendant to the throne of Ul'dah, Her Royal Majesty Nanamo Ul Namo presides!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400010_LADYSMAIDナルザルの神子にしてザナラーンの守護者、
第十七代ウルダハ王、
ナナモ・ウル・ナモ陛下のおな～り～。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400020_SULTANSWORM<tab>Long live Nanamo! Glory to the Sultana! Forever may she reign!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400020_SULTANSWORM<tab>ナナモ様！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400030_SULTANSWORM<tab>Long live Nanamo! Glory to the Sultana! Forever may she reign!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400030_SULTANSWORM<tab>ナナモ様だ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400040_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>They regaled me with tales of a champion amongst champions, one whose tireless service to the crown merited the highest honor we might bestow.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400040_NANAMOULNAMOそなたか。
わらわのために尽力した冒険者と言うのは。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400050_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Never did it occur to me that it might be you. Bring it forth!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400050_NANAMOULNAMO礼を言いにきた。
褒めてつかわすぞ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400060_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Betokening our gratitude and esteem, I, Nanamo Ul Namo, Sultana of Ul'dah, confer upon you this gift.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400060_NANAMOULNAMOこの度の褒美の品じゃ。
取っておくがよい。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>ラウバーンや。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400080_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400080_RAUBAHN<tab>ハッ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>See to it that our champion is my personal guest at the banquet.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400090_NANAMOULNAMO後日に晩餐会が予定されておったであろう？
この者も、その場へ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400100_RAUBAHN<tab>As you command, Your Grace.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400100_RAUBAHN<tab>仰せのとおりに。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400110_RAUBAHN<tab>If what they say is true, Ul'dah owes you a great debt.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400110_RAUBAHN貴様が噂の冒険者か。
ウルダハのために活躍しておるそうだな。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400120_RAUBAHN<tab>Strange that we should not have met before this day...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400120_RAUBAHN貴様は……？
クッ、頭の中がうずく……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400130_RAUBAHN<tab>...I sense we are kindred spirits.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400130_RAUBAHNダメだ。
まるで霞がかかったように……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400140_RAUBAHN<tab>I am not given to superstition, but I'll be sworn our tales belong in the same saga.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400140_RAUBAHN……しかし、不思議なものだ。
お互い、面識はないはずなのに、
このような懐かしさを感じるとはな……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400150_RAUBAHN<tab>I am Raubahn Aldynn. With the consent of Her Grace, I oversee the affairs of the sultanate.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400150_RAUBAHN吾輩は、ラウバーン・アルディン。
ナナモ女王陛下の元で、
ウルダハの政（まつりごと）を担う者だ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400160_RAUBAHN<tab>Brave souls are few and far between in these times. I count my blessings when I find one.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400160_RAUBAHN貴様のような有能な冒険者が
我が国を訪れたことは僥倖（ぎょうこう）につきる。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400170_RAUBAHN<tab>Her Grace invites you to join her at the coming banquet. I trust I will see you there.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400170_RAUBAHN女王陛下の仰せだ。
ぜひとも晩餐会に出席してほしい。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400180_SULTANSWORM<tab>An honor indeed!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400180_SULTANSWORM<tab>なんと！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400190_SULTANSWORM<tab>Huzzah! Come, hero!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400190_SULTANSWORM<tab>すばらしい……！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400200_RAUBAHN<tab>Until then.
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400200_RAUBAHN<tab>では、待っておるぞ。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400210_RAUBAHN<tab>For the sake of Her Grace, and the glory of the sultanate, may you walk in the light of the Crystal.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_400210_RAUBAHNそれから……。
これからもウルダハに力を貸してくれたまえ。
貴様に、クリスタルの導きがあらんことを。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_120<tab>You have my thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for helping to defend Her Grace's good name, and for sparing the Sultansworn further dishonor. I believe Master Papashan would like to thank you personally.
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_OWYNE_000_120銀冑団の、いや、ウルダハ王家の名誉は
お前の手によって守られたのだ。
礼を言うぞ、冒険者！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat Garibald the Fargone and his minions!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_TODO001<tab>ガリバルドたちを倒せ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALK01<tab>Fight for your sultana, boy! Fight for Ul'dah!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALK01これでも昔は近衛騎士！
わしの実力を見せてやるわい！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALKBOSS_HP25_REACT<tab>Yield or be slain, thief! I will not ask again!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALKBOSS_HP25_REACT<tab>もう少しじゃ！　冒険者殿、全力で攻めますぞ！

source:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALK01As you command, Master Papashan!
With me, )) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALK01実戦経験が少なくたって、戦ってみせる！
冒険者よ、雑魚から片付けるぞ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALKBALLOON_01<tab>Ugh...there are so many...
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALKBALLOON_01<tab>実戦の経験不足か！？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_BALLOON_01<tab>Old men shouldn't play with swords!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_BALLOON_01<tab>こしゃくな真似を！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_BALLOON_02<tab>I will cut your heart out, old man!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_BALLOON_02<tab>王家に媚び諂う雑魚どもがぁ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALK02<tab>Stand your ground, Sultansworn!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALK02<tab>増援じゃと！？　周辺に潜んでおったのか！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALK02<tab>Is that a <var 1A 02 /var>voidsent<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALK02依代も無しに妖異を召喚しただと！？
ええい、なんとしても耐えるんだ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_01<tab>Meddlesome fools! You know not whom you face!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_01銀冑団の力、侮ったか……！？
ならば、天使いの秘術にて沈めてくれる！

source:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_03Hearken to me, denizen of the abyss!
Slay these interlopers and feast upon their souls!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_GARIBALD_BATTLETALK_03出よ、深淵に棲みし異形の者よ！
我の言葉に従い、奴らを蹴散らせ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALKHP50<tab>Whatever happens, do not let them escape with the crown!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALKHP50<tab>齢には勝てぬと！？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALKDEAD<tab>Ugh...I have failed you...
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_PAPASHAN_BATTLETALKDEAD<tab>ひ、姫様……ナナモ様……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALKDEAD<tab>The crown... We must...
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_OWYNE_BATTLETALKDEADくそ、こんなところで……。
私には王冠を取り戻す使命が……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SULTANSWORMA_DEAD<tab>I...I cannot...
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SULTANSWORMA_DEAD<tab>つ、強い……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SULTANSWORMB_DEAD<tab>Forgive me, brothers...
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SULTANSWORMB_DEAD<tab>ここまでか……。

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_TODO002<tab>Defeat the masked mage!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_TODO002<tab>仮面の魔道士たちを倒せ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_001<tab>Soon, you shall take your vile gifts to the grave!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_001<tab>死ぬがいい……穢れた力を持つものよ！

source:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_POISONMwahahaha!
Writhe as the venom eats its way through your veins!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_POISON<tab>ハハハッ！　その猛毒で、もがき苦しむがいい！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_01<tab>An unwelcome guest. No matter, all shall fall before me!
target:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_01チッ……邪魔が入ったか……
構わん、まとめて葬ってやる！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_HP60<tab>Whence springs this preternatural might!?
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_HP60<tab>ここまでの力とは……！？

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SANCRED_ENTER<tab>You certainly have a knack for getting into trouble!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SANCRED_ENTER<tab>間に合ったな！　助太刀するぜ！

source: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_HP40<tab>No mortal should possess such strength!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_HP40<tab>貴様の力は一体！？

source:
TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SANCRED_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_HP20Keep it up, )) (( )) 02 /var>!
We almost have him!
target: TEXT_MANWIL007_00551_QIB_SANCRED_MASKEDMAGUS_BATTLETALK_HP20<tab>いける！　よし、一気にたたみかけるぜ！
